title: Play UI
desc: A family of tools that brings a utility-based approach to UI development along with a full development story. Try an empowering way to build modern UIs

features.title: Succinct API
features.desc: Love the succintness of the jQuery library? Play UI looks and feels just like it.

features.title: Async UI
features.desc: Build automatically resilient UIs even without knowing it with Play UI's Async UI strategy.

features.title: Descrete
features.desc: Use as all-in-one ($(el).xyz()) or via descrete modules (import { xyz } from '...').

features.title: Universal
features.desc: Use in the browser and in node.js, and alongside the UI technologies of your choice.
